channel.title: Language Documentation on Hugh's Curriculum Vitae
channel.description: Recent content in Language Documentation on Hugh's Curriculum Vitae

item.title: U̠t-Ma'in Lexicography
item.description: A collaboration with Becky Paterson to organize the various layers of U̠t-Ma’in linguistic data into a shareable resource.

item.title: U̠t-Ma'in oral history
item.description: U̠t-Ma’in Language Documentation with Becky Paterson.

item.title: Academic resources for Ethno-arts in Nigeria
item.description: This post is a quick review of the ethno-arts literature before a general language documentation project in Northern Nigeria.

item.title: Audio File Formats - A follow up to the SIL internal conversation on the Linguistics Discussion List
Meꞌphaa and Sochiapam Chinantec Keyboards
item.description: Revolutionizing text input. We moved text input from being on a single OS via a non-unicode input method, to working on multiple OSes in Unicode.

item.title: Geo-Linguistics
item.description: This project seeks to visually display patterns about languages as those visualizations relate to cartography.

item.title: Geo-Linguistics
item.description: This project seeks to visually display patterns about languages as those visualizations relate to cartography.

item.title: Meꞌphaa Language Documentation
item.description: A collaboration with an experienced linguist. I contributed extensive metadata and technical audio-visual expertise a team of people from the USA and Meꞌphaa speakers.

item.title: Interdental approximant
item.description: An investigation and description of a rare and socially stigmatized speech sound where the tongue protrudes out of the mouth.
